title: Review Replies
description: Schema for review replies generated in review-fix mode. Contains structured responses to GitHub PR review comments.

replies.description: Array of reply objects, one per review comment.

comment_id.description: Unique identifier for the review comment to reply to (GitHub comment ID).

comment_body.description: The text content of the original review comment being responded to.

reply.description: The proposed response to the review comment.

action_taken.description: Description of any code changes made to address the review comment. Optional if no changes were made.
